name: Radhuni Custard Powder
description:
Radhuni Custard Powder is a premium quality powder used to make a smooth and creamy custard. It is flavored with vanilla and is perfect for creating a rich, indulgent dessert or as a topping for various sweet dishes. This custard powder is easy to use and guarantees a silky texture with a delightful taste. Ingredients: Cornflour, Artificial Vanilla Flavor, Yellow Food ColoringSugar (may be added as per taste). Uses:Custard: Mix the powder with milk (and sugar if desired) to create a creamy custard for puddings or as a dessert base.Toppings: Serve as a topping for cakes, pies, fruit salads, or pancakes.Filling for Pastries: Use as a filling for pastries or desserts like éclairs and tarts.Milkshakes: Blend into milkshakes for a rich, vanilla-flavored drink.Quick and Easy: Ready in minutes, making it ideal for quick desserts.Versatile: Can be used in a variety of sweet dishes, from puddings to pies.Creamy Texture: Creates a smooth and silky custard that enhances any dessert.No Artificial Preservatives: Free from harmful preservatives, making it a safe option for family use.
Radhuni Custard Powder is a premium quality powder used to make a smooth and creamy custard. It is flavored with vanilla and is perfect for creating a rich, indulgent dessert or as a topping for various sweet dishes. This custard powder is easy to use and guarantees a silky texture with a delightful taste.
 
Ingredients: Cornflour, Artificial Vanilla Flavor, Yellow Food Coloring
Sugar (may be added as per taste).
 
Uses:
Custard: Mix the powder with milk (and sugar if desired) to create a creamy custard for puddings or as a dessert base.
Toppings: Serve as a topping for cakes, pies, fruit salads, or pancakes.
Filling for Pastries: Use as a filling for pastries or desserts like éclairs and tarts.
Milkshakes: Blend into milkshakes for a rich, vanilla-flavored drink.
Quick and Easy: Ready in minutes, making it ideal for quick desserts.
Versatile: Can be used in a variety of sweet dishes, from puddings to pies.
Creamy Texture: Creates a smooth and silky custard that enhances any dessert.
No Artificial Preservatives: Free from harmful preservatives, making it a safe option for family use.

name: Foster Clark's Custard Powder Tin
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Australia and its raw materials are collected from Malta. Foster Clark's Custard Powder is specially prepared to help you make delicious sweet dishes and various sauces to garnish your savory dishes. To obtain the fine light texture that you desire in your cakes and pastries, replace one-eighth of the flour with Foster Clark's Custard Powder.

name: khejurer Gur Patali Premium
description:
Khejurer Gur Patali, also known as Date Palm Jaggery Patali or Date Palm Jaggery Candy, is a traditional sweet delicacy popular in certain regions. Here are the general features and characteristics of this product-  Ingredients: It is primarily made from the sap or juice extracted from the date palm tree. The sap is collected and then concentrated to form jaggery.  Sweetness and Flavor: Khejurer Gur Patali has a natural sweetness and a unique flavor profile that is different from regular sugar. It has a distinct taste that comes from the date palm. Nutritional Value: Date palm jaggery is considered a healthier alternative to refined sugar as it retains some of the natural minerals and nutrients present in the sap of the date palm.

name: Farmer's Gold Khejurer Jhola Gur
description:
Immerse yourself in the exquisite sweetness of Farmer's Gold Khejurer Jhola Gur, a 500g treasure that encapsulates the pure and authentic essence of date palm jaggery. Handcrafted with care and steeped in tradition, this jaggery offering is a delightful journey into the heart of natural sweetness. Farmer's Gold Khejurer Jhola Gur is more than just a sweetener; it's a connection to the traditions of our land and the artistry of our craftsmen. Whether you're a home cook, a professional chef, or simply someone with a sweet tooth, this jaggery offers a delightful and authentic taste experience. Experience the pure sweetness of tradition, nurture your body with natural goodness, and elevate your culinary creations with Farmer's Gold Khejurer Jhola Gur (500g). Taste the legacy, savor the quality, and rediscover the joy of unadulterated sweetness.

name: Chuadangar Khejurer Gur
description:
Chuadangar Khejurer Gur 1kg is a traditional, natural date palm jaggery known for its rich flavor and caramel-like sweetness. Made from the sap of date palm trees, this jaggery is an essential ingredient in many desserts and traditional recipes. Its authentic taste and aroma make it a favorite for sweetening dishes in a healthy, natural way.

name: Tiara Jelly (Orange) Dessert
description:
Tiara Jelly (Orange) Dessert is a delightful and convenient treat that brings the refreshing taste of juicy oranges to your palate. This 85 gm cup of jelly dessert is a delightful fusion of fruity sweetness and a satisfying gelatinous texture, creating a perfect dessert or snack option for moments when you crave a burst of fruity indulgence.
